title: Please RIOT take down the penalty given for not locking in champ in ranked champ select.
body: some people forget to lock in so they can do masteries etc. then get the ban even when hovering a champ. please fix this :(

replies.body: It's definitely better having it. I've  been kicked a few times so far but that's because I'm not used to it. Commit to the game if you're gonna play it.
It's too hard to left click.
